trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around June 14th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: today,6\14\05,3:30pm. sitting in back yard looking north, a large jet flying south emitting 2 chem trails. as trails start to disappear a round object appears, i ask both my son and husband do you see that? at first i thought it might be a ballon but realize it is too high in the sky to be a ballon i go in the to get the binoculars and hand them to my husband, he spots the object in the clouds and is trying to tell me where it is as i have lost my visual of it.the clouds were going east and when i first saw it the object was going west then went into the clouds. husband and son spot object.sun reflecting,very shiny metal,husband saysoh, my god,its gone,shotstraight up in theair.whole thing lasted at least 10 minutes.
